com.facebook.buck.command

Interface BuildExecutor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalBuildExecutor

    public interface BuildExecutor
    Interface to be followed by local/distributed builders.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExitCode buildLocallyAndReturnExitCode(Iterable<String> targetsToBuild, Optional<Path> pathToBuildReport)
      Builds the given targets synchronously.
      CachingBuildEngine getCachingBuildEngine()
      Accessor method for the CachingBuildEngine instance being used by this BuildExecutor.
      List<BuildEngineResult> initializeBuild(Iterable<String> targetsToBuild)
      Starts building the given targets, but does not wait for them to finish
      void shutdown()
      Destroy any resources associated with this builder.
      ExitCode waitForBuildToFinish(Iterable<String> targetsToBuild, List<BuildEngineResult> resultFutures, Optional<Path> pathToBuildReport)
      Waits for all targets contained in resultFutures to finish.

    • Method Detail

      • buildLocallyAndReturnExitCode

        ExitCode buildLocallyAndReturnExitCode(Iterable<String> targetsToBuild,
                                       Optional<Path> pathToBuildReport)
                                throws IOException,
                                       InterruptedException
        Builds the given targets synchronously. Failures are printed to the EventBus.
        Parameters:
        targetsToBuild -
        Returns:
        exit code.
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException

      • initializeBuild

        List<BuildEngineResult> initializeBuild(Iterable<String> targetsToBuild)
                                 throws IOException
        Starts building the given targets, but does not wait for them to finish
        Parameters:
        targetsToBuild -
        Returns:
        Futures representing the targets that are building.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • waitForBuildToFinish

        ExitCode waitForBuildToFinish(Iterable<String> targetsToBuild,
                              List<BuildEngineResult> resultFutures,
                              Optional<Path> pathToBuildReport)
        Waits for all targets contained in resultFutures to finish.
        Parameters:
        targetsToBuild - - same as passed to initializeBuild call
        resultFutures - - result from initializeBuild call
        Returns:
        exit code

      • getCachingBuildEngine

        CachingBuildEngine getCachingBuildEngine()
        Accessor method for the CachingBuildEngine instance being used by this BuildExecutor.

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
       throws IOException
        Destroy any resources associated with this builder. Call this once only, when all buildLocallyAndReturnExitCode calls have finished.
        Throws:
        IOException
